effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.platinum: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.
flavor_text.platinum: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.
